info.description: This is the api to access the ODWeather API information
info.title: ODWeather

get.description:
Get forecast and realtime information for known points
None

parameters.description: Weather station to compare, values: cnareanl|cmsap|boyaenderrocat|areopuertopalma
parameters.name: stationName

get.description:
Get data from the aemet stations
None

parameters.description: station name currently: aeropuertopalma | caboblanco
parameters.name: stationName

parameters.description: Period of time to get the data. Options: lastdata lastday
parameters.name: period

get.description:
Get forecast points of a yatchclub
None

parameters.description: base URL for the the
parameters.name: yatchclubid

parameters.description: latitude for the forecast
parameters.name: latitude

parameters.description: longitude for the forecast
parameters.name: longitude

parameters.description: initial date for the forecast ISO string YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS.SZ
parameters.name: inittime

parameters.description: end date for the forecast ISO string YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS.SZ
parameters.name: endtime

parameters.description: optional number of days in string. Will be added to init forecast date
parameters.name: days

parameters.description: optional number of hours in string. Will be added to init forecast date
parameters.name: hours

parameters.description: Comma separated values for the weather parameteres temperature,rain,wind_u,wind_v,gust,pressure,cloud,humidity&wave=height,direction,period
parameters.name: weather

parameters.description: Comma separated values for the wave parameteres height,direction,period
parameters.name: wave

parameters.description: Direct file I want to extract
parameters.name: entryid

parameters.name: endtime

parameters.description: optional number of days in string. Will be added to init forecast date
parameters.name: days

parameters.name: hours

parameters.description: Comma separated values for the weather parameteres temperature,rain,wind_u,wind_v,gust,pressure,cloud,humidity&wave=height,direction,period
parameters.name: weather

Get data from the socib bahia de palma buoy
None
